content: If an error happens during initial messages, the app works correctly. But, If an error happens during the LLM response to a user's reply, make it as if the user clicked the edit message next to their reply instead.
Can you pop up the error "Error: An error occurred while processing the chat with images" instead of showing it as a message in the chat.

Can you show more information in the popup message? Here's some of the data included:
Error in chat with images API: Error: Claude API request failed with status 400: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"invalid_request_error","message":"messages.11: all messages must have non-empty content except for the optional final assistant message"}}
I think error details aren't being sent in chat-with-images. make it return error messages similar to the /chat endpoint.
